Welcome to modlAMP's documentation!
===================================

This python package is designed to work with peptide sequences containing natural amino acids. It includes several molecular
peptide descriptors as well as different methods to generate peptide sequences in silico.

Package Contents:
-----------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   READMEinclude
   modules
   TODOinclude
